Symbol.Script_3D:
!-----------3d--------------------- if show_el < EPS then end if GLOB_VIEW_TYPE=2 then gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_2D_m if (GLOB_PREVIEW_MODE or GLOB_FEEDBACK_MODE or GLOB_SEO_TOOL_MODE and gs_detlevel_3D_m > EPS) then gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 IF gs_detlevel_3D_m < EPS THEN END CALL "MEP_m_RequestSystemGlobals" PARAMETERS ALL one_ConID=0 returned_parameters gs_cont_pen, sMat, gs_InsMat, MEP_cline_pen, show_el
duct_show = duct_show*not(show_axis)
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN END res = 24 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN res = 8 ! Simple
PEN gs_cont_pen RESOL res
IF useSysMat AND MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] <> "0" THEN gs_DuctMat = sMat ! gs_InsMat = sMat ENDIF MATERIAL gs_DuctMat
DIM MEP_InclinedPartPosition[][]
MEP_InclinedPartPosition[1][1] = 0 MEP_InclinedPartPosition[1][2] = 0 MEP_InclinedPartPosition[1][3] = 0
MEP_InclinedPartPosition[2][1] = 1 MEP_InclinedPartPosition[2][2] = 0 MEP_InclinedPartPosition[2][3] = 0
MEP_InclinedPartPosition[3][1] = 0 MEP_InclinedPartPosition[3][2] = 1 MEP_InclinedPartPosition[3][3] = 0
unID = 1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][18]) < EPS AND ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[2][18] - 1) < EPS THEN
! ****** rotation ****** !
XFORM defaultMatrix[1][1], defaultMatrix[2][1], defaultMatrix[3][1], MEP_Position[1][1], defaultMatrix[1][2], defaultMatrix[2][2], defaultMatrix[3][2], MEP_Position[1][2], defaultMatrix[1][3], defaultMatrix[2][3], defaultMatrix[3][3], MEP_Position[1][3]
dist_y = ConPosY_1+ConLength_1/2
HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, Rotation, 6: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, dist_y, 0, unID, Rotation, 4+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, dist_y*COS(Rotation), dist_y*SIN(Rotation), unID, Rotation, 5: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 1, 0, 0, unID, Rotation, 7: unID=unID+1
DEL 1 ENDIF
IF arched AND ABS(MEP_TakeoffTypeID - 1) < EPS THEN IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21] - 2) < EPS THEN Take_off_Size = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12]+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14]*2 Take_off_Size_WInsThk = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12]+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14]*2+MEP_InsThickness addPart = take_off_most_size_wo_wthk - MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12]/2 ELSE Take_off_Size = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][13]+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14]*2 Take_off_Size_WInsThk = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12]+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14]*2+MEP_InsThickness addPart = take_off_most_size_wo_wthk - MEP_NumConnectionData[1][13]/2 ENDIF
det = duct_radius^2-(Take_off_Size/2)^2 if det>EPS then squareValue = SQR(det) IF squareValue < EPS THEN move_back = duct_radius ELSE move_back = duct_radius-SQR(squareValue) ENDIF else move_back = duct_radius endif
squareValue = duct_radius_WInsThk^2-(Take_off_Size_WInsThk/2)^2 IF squareValue < EPS THEN move_back_WInsThk = duct_radius_WInsThk ELSE move_back_WInsThk = duct_radius_WInsThk-SQR(squareValue) ENDIF ENDIF
offset_y = 0 IF ABS(MEP_TakeoffTypeID - 2) < EPS THEN offset_y = -InclPartLength/2-(addWidthIn3D/2)*arched
XFORM MEP_Position[2][1], MEP_Position[3][1], dZx, MEP_Position[1][1], MEP_Position[2][2], MEP_Position[3][2], dZy, MEP_Position[1][2], MEP_Position[2][3], MEP_Position[3][3], dZz, MEP_Position[1][3]
IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][18]) < EPS AND ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[2][18]) > EPS AND ABS(DuctShapeType - 1) < EPS THEN IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21] - 2) < EPS THEN Take_off_Half_Size = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12]/2+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14] ELSE Take_off_Half_Size = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][13]/2+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14] ENDIF IF ABS(MEP_TakeoffTypeID - 1) < EPS AND InclPartLength > EPS THEN Take_off_Half_Size = Take_off_Half_Size + InclPartLength
IF reverse THEN limit_1 = DuctWidth/2+DuctWallThickness-Take_off_Half_Size ELSE limit_1 = DuctDepth/2+DuctWallThickness-Take_off_Half_Size ENDIF
IF limit_1 > 0 THEN HOTSPOT ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1+Take_off_Half_Size, unID, TakeoffPos, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1+Take_off_Half_Size-1, unID, TakeoffPos, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1+Take_off_Half_Size+TakeoffPos, unID, TakeoffPos, 2: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1-Take_off_Half_Size, unID, TakeoffPos, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1-Take_off_Half_Size-1, unID, TakeoffPos, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1-Take_off_Half_Size+TakeoffPos, unID, TakeoffPos, 2: unID=unID+1 ENDIF ENDIF
ADDz TakeoffPos
IF duct_show and not(show_axis) THEN ! -----> duct+connection <----- !
IF ABS(DuctShapeType-1) < EPS THEN
IF reverse THEN halfWidth = DuctDepth/2+DuctWallThickness halfDepth = DuctWidth/2+DuctWallThickness ELSE halfWidth = DuctWidth/2+DuctWallThickness halfDepth = DuctDepth/2+DuctWallThickness ENDIF
ROTy 90 mm = 15 !! IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21]-1) < EPS THEN mm = 8
CUTPOLYA 4, 2, 0, halfDepth, halfWidth, mm, halfDepth, -halfWidth, mm, -halfDepth, -halfWidth, mm, -halfDepth, halfWidth, mm DEL 1 cc = 1 ENDIF
IF ABS(DuctShapeType-2) < EPS THEN ROTy 90
!!ADDZ -0.5 !!PRISM_ 2, 1, !! 0, 0, 915, !! DuctWidth/2+DuctWallThickness, 360, 4015 !!DEL 1
CUTPOLYA 2, 2, 0, 0, 0, 913, DuctWidth/2+DuctWallThickness, 360, 4013 DEL 1 cc = 1 ENDIF
IF ABS(DuctShapeType-3) < EPS THEN IF reverse THEN halfWidth = DuctDepth/2+DuctWallThickness halfDepth = DuctWidth/2+DuctWallThickness ELSE halfWidth = DuctWidth/2+DuctWallThickness halfDepth = DuctDepth/2+DuctWallThickness ENDIF
ROTy 90 IF ABS(halfWidth-halfDepth) < EPS THEN
!!ADDZ -0.5 !!PRISM_ 2, 1, !! 0, 0, 915, !! DuctWidth/2+DuctWallThickness, 360, 4015 !!DEL 1
CUTPOLYA 2, 2, 0, 0, 0, 913, DuctWidth/2+DuctWallThickness, 360, 4013 ENDIF
IF halfWidth > halfDepth THEN
!!ADDZ -0.5 !!PRISM_ 5, 1, !! halfDepth, halfWidth-halfDepth, 15, !! halfDepth, -halfWidth+halfDepth, 15, !! -halfDepth, -halfWidth+halfDepth, 1015, !! -halfDepth, halfWidth-halfDepth, 15, !! halfDepth, halfWidth-halfDepth, 1015 !!DEL 1
CUTPOLYA 5, 2, 0, halfDepth, halfWidth-halfDepth, 13, halfDepth, -halfWidth+halfDepth, 13, -halfDepth, -halfWidth+halfDepth, 1013, -halfDepth, halfWidth-halfDepth, 13, halfDepth, halfWidth-halfDepth, 1013 ENDIF
IF halfWidth < halfDepth THEN rr = halfWidth
!!ADDZ -0.5 !!PRISM_ 5, 1, !! halfDepth-halfWidth, halfWidth, 15, !! -halfDepth+halfWidth, halfWidth, 15, !! -halfDepth+halfWidth, -halfWidth, 1015, !! halfDepth-halfWidth, -halfWidth, 15, !! halfDepth-halfWidth, halfWidth, 1015 !!DEL 1
CUTPOLYA 5, 2, 0, halfDepth-halfWidth, halfWidth, 13, -halfDepth+halfWidth, halfWidth, 13, -halfDepth+halfWidth, -halfWidth, 1013, halfDepth-halfWidth, -halfWidth, 13, halfDepth-halfWidth, halfWidth, 1013 ENDIF DEL 1 cc = 1 ENDIF
dd = 0 IF InclPartLength THEN dd = 1 ADD ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1+InclPartLength-move_back, ConPosZ_1 CUTPLANE 90 DEL 1 ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL SetProgram = SetProgram, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, gs_ConMat = gs_DuctMat, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 1, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData
IF dd THEN CUTEND
InclPartLength_temp = 0 IF InclPartLength THEN InclPartLength_temp = InclPartLength
DIM NumInclinedPartData[2][25]
NumInclinedPartData[1][14] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][14] NumInclinedPartData[1][15] = 0 NumInclinedPartData[1][21] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][21]
NumInclinedPartData[2][12] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12] NumInclinedPartData[2][13] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][13] NumInclinedPartData[2][14] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14] NumInclinedPartData[2][15] = 0 NumInclinedPartData[2][21] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21]
IF ABS(MEP_TakeoffTypeID - 1) < EPS THEN IF arched THEN NumInclinedPartData[1][12] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][12]+addPart NumInclinedPartData[1][13] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][13]+addPart
XFORM 0, 1, 0, ConPosX_1, 1, 0, 0, ConPosY_1-move_back-(take_off_most_size - Take_off_Size/2 - InclPartLength), 0, 0, -1, ConPosZ_1
InclPartLength = take_off_most_size - Take_off_Size/2 ELSE NumInclinedPartData[1][12] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][12] IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21] - 2) < EPS THEN NumInclinedPartData[1][13] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12] ELSE NumInclinedPartData[1][13] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][13] ENDIF
XFORM 0, 1, 0, ConPosX_1, 1, 0, 0, ConPosY_1, 0, 0, -1, ConPosZ_1 ENDIF ELSE NumInclinedPartData[1][12] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][12]+addWidthIn3D*arched IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21] - 2) < EPS THEN NumInclinedPartData[1][13] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12] ELSE NumInclinedPartData[1][13] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][13] ENDIF
XFORM 0, 1, 0, ConPosX_1-offset_y, 1, 0, 0, ConPosY_1-addWidthIn3D*arched, 0, 0, -1, ConPosZ_1
InclPartLength = InclPartLength+addWidthIn3D*arched ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_Duct_4" PARAMETERS ALL gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m, MEP_Position = MEP_InclinedPartPosition, MEP_StraightLength = InclPartLength, MEP_offset_y = offset_y, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_StatusLine = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, duct_show = 1, MEP_cline_show_3D = MEP_cline_show_3D, gs_DuctMat = gs_DuctMat, gs_InsMat = gs_InsMat, editable = 0, nonEditHtps = 0, MEP_NumberConnections = 2, MEP_NumConnectionData = NumInclinedPartData DEL 1 ENDIF
IF cc THEN CUTEND
InclPartLength = InclPartLength_temp IF NeedHtpstoInclPartLength THEN HOTSPOT ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1, unID, InclPartLength, 1: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1-1, ConPosZ_1, unID, InclPartLength, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1+InclPartLength, ConPosZ_1, unID, InclPartLength, 2: unID=unID+1 ENDIF ENDIF
IF (MEP_cline_show_3D and show_axis_and) or show_axis THEN ! -----> center line <----- ! CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL SetProgram = SetProgram, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 0, gs_ConMat = gs_DuctMat, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 1, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 0, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData ENDIF
cc = 0: dd = 0 IF (MEP_InsShow and show_isol and not(show_axis)) THEN ! -----> insulation <----- ! IF ABS(DuctShapeType-1) < EPS THEN IF reverse THEN halfWidth = DuctDepth/2+DuctWallThickness+MEP_InsThickness halfDepth = DuctWidth/2+DuctWallThickness+MEP_InsThickness ELSE halfWidth = DuctWidth/2+DuctWallThickness+MEP_InsThickness halfDepth = DuctDepth/2+DuctWallThickness+MEP_InsThickness ENDIF
ROTy 90 mm = 15 !! IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21]-1) < EPS THEN mm = 8
CUTPOLYA 4, 2, 0, halfDepth, halfWidth, mm, halfDepth, -halfWidth, mm, -halfDepth, -halfWidth, mm, -halfDepth, halfWidth, mm DEL 1 cc = 1 ENDIF
IF ABS(DuctShapeType-2) < EPS THEN ROTy 90 CUTPOLYA 2, 2, 0, 0, 0, 913, DuctWidth/2+DuctWallThickness+MEP_InsThickness, 360, 4013 DEL 1 cc = 1 ENDIF
IF ABS(DuctShapeType-3) < EPS THEN IF reverse THEN halfWidth = DuctDepth/2+DuctWallThickness+MEP_InsThickness halfDepth = DuctWidth/2+DuctWallThickness+MEP_InsThickness ELSE halfWidth = DuctWidth/2+DuctWallThickness+MEP_InsThickness halfDepth = DuctDepth/2+DuctWallThickness+MEP_InsThickness ENDIF
ROTy 90 IF ABS(halfWidth-halfDepth) < EPS THEN CUTPOLYA 2, 2, 0, 0, 0, 913, DuctWidth/2+DuctWallThickness, 360, 4013 ENDIF
IF halfWidth > halfDepth THEN CUTPOLYA 5, 2, 0, halfDepth, halfWidth-halfDepth, 13, halfDepth, -halfWidth+halfDepth, 13, -halfDepth, -halfWidth+halfDepth, 1013, -halfDepth, halfWidth-halfDepth, 13, halfDepth, halfWidth-halfDepth, 1013 ENDIF
IF halfWidth < halfDepth THEN rr = halfWidth CUTPOLYA 5, 2, 0, halfDepth-halfWidth, halfWidth, 13, -halfDepth+halfWidth, halfWidth, 13, -halfDepth+halfWidth, -halfWidth, 1013, halfDepth-halfWidth, -halfWidth, 13, halfDepth-halfWidth, halfWidth, 1013 ENDIF DEL 1 cc = 1 ENDIF
IF InclPartLength THEN dd = 1 ADD ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1+InclPartLength-move_back_WInsThk+MEP_InsThickness, ConPosZ_1 CUTPLANE 90 DEL 1 ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL SetProgram = SetProgram, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 0, MEP_InsShow = 1, MEP_InsThickness = MEP_InsThickness, gs_InsMat = gs_InsMat, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 1, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData
IF dd THEN CUTEND
IF InclPartLength THEN DIM NumInclinedPartData[2][25]
NumInclinedPartData[1][14] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][14] NumInclinedPartData[1][15] = 0 NumInclinedPartData[1][21] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][21]
NumInclinedPartData[2][12] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12] NumInclinedPartData[2][13] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][13] NumInclinedPartData[2][14] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14] NumInclinedPartData[2][15] = 0 NumInclinedPartData[2][21] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21]
IF ABS(MEP_TakeoffTypeID - 1) < EPS THEN IF arched THEN NumInclinedPartData[1][12] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][12]+addPart NumInclinedPartData[1][13] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][13]+addPart
XFORM 0, 1, 0, ConPosX_1, 1, 0, 0, ConPosY_1+MEP_InsThickness-move_back_WInsThk-(take_off_most_size_WInsThk - Take_off_Size_WInsThk/2 - InclPartLength), 0, 0, -1, ConPosZ_1
InclPartLength = take_off_most_size_WInsThk - Take_off_Size_WInsThk/2 ELSE NumInclinedPartData[1][12] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][12] IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21] - 2) < EPS THEN NumInclinedPartData[1][13] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12] ELSE NumInclinedPartData[1][13] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][13] ENDIF
XFORM 0, 1, 0, ConPosX_1, 1, 0, 0, ConPosY_1+MEP_InsThickness, 0, 0, -1, ConPosZ_1
ENDIF ELSE NumInclinedPartData[1][12] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][12]+addWidthIn3D*arched IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21] - 2) < EPS THEN NumInclinedPartData[1][13] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12] ELSE NumInclinedPartData[1][13] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][13] ENDIF
XFORM 0, 1, 0, ConPosX_1-offset_y, 1, 0, 0, ConPosY_1+MEP_InsThickness-addWidthIn3D*arched, 0, 0, -1, ConPosZ_1
InclPartLength_temp = InclPartLength InclPartLength = InclPartLength+addWidthIn3D*arched ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_Duct_4" PARAMETERS ALL gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D, MEP_Position = MEP_InclinedPartPosition, MEP_StraightLength = InclPartLength, MEP_offset_y = offset_y, MEP_InsShow = MEP_InsShow, MEP_InsThickness = MEP_InsThickness, MEP_StatusLine = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, duct_show = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_DuctMat = gs_DuctMat, gs_InsMat = gs_InsMat, editable = editable, nonEditHtps = 0, MEP_NumberConnections = 2, MEP_NumConnectionData = NumInclinedPartData DEL 1 ENDIF
IF cc THEN CUTEND ENDIF DEL 2
Symbol.Script_2D:
!-----------2d--------------------- if show_el < EPS then end IF gs_detlevel_2D_m < EPS THEN END CALL "MEP_m_RequestSystemGlobals" PARAMETERS ALL one_ConID=0 returned_parameters gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, MEP_cline_type, MEP_cline_pen, show_el
PEN gs_cont_pen SET FILL gs_fill_type
HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds = 30000
hceID_1 = HptsUnIDBeginForConnEnds+100
ADD2 MEP_Position[1][1], MEP_Position[1][2]
unID = 1 IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][18]) < EPS AND ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[2][18] - 1) < EPS THEN IF ABS(ABS(MEP_Position[2][3]) - 1) < EPS THEN dist_y = ConPosY_1+ConLength_1/2 HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, Rotation, 6: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 dist_y, 0, unID, Rotation, 4+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 dist_y*COS(Rotation), dist_y*SIN(Rotation), unID, Rotation, 5: unID=unID+1 ELSE dist_y = ConPosY_1+ConLength_1/2
dx = defaultMatrix[1][1] dy = defaultMatrix[1][2]
length = SQR(dx^2+dy^2) IF ABS(length-1) > EPS THEN dx = dx/length dy = dy/length ENDIF
arCosVal = dx/1 IF ABS(arCosVal) > 1 AND SGN(arCosVal) = -1 THEN arCosVal = -1 IF ABS(arCosVal) > 1 AND SGN(arCosVal) = 1 THEN arCosVal = 1 dirAngOnXYPlane = ACS(arCosVal) IF SGN(dy) = -1 THEN dirAngOnXYPlane = 360-dirAngOnXYPlane
ROT2 90+dirAngOnXYPlane
! Compatibility part in case of forward migration until the first parameter script running IF (GLOB_MODPAR_NAME <> "LimitedRotation") & (ABS(Rotation - LimitedRotation) > EPS) THEN LimitedRotation = Rotation ENDIF ! End of compatibility part in case of forward migration until the first parameter script running
! LimitedRotation is used only in 2D and if the Duct Straight is not parallel to the global z-axis HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, LimitedRotation, 6: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 dist_y, 0, unID, LimitedRotation, 4+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 dist_y*COS(LimitedRotation), dist_y*SIN(LimitedRotation), unID, LimitedRotation, 5: unID=unID+1
DEL 1 ENDIF ENDIF
IF ABS(MEP_Position[3][3]) < EPS THEN dx = MEP_Position[3][1] dy = MEP_Position[3][2]
length = SQR(dx^2+dy^2) IF ABS(length-1) > EPS THEN dx = dx/length dy = dy/length ENDIF
arCosVal = dx/1 IF ABS(arCosVal) > 1 AND SGN(arCosVal) = -1 THEN arCosVal = -1 IF ABS(arCosVal) > 1 AND SGN(arCosVal) = 1 THEN arCosVal = 1 dirAngOnXYPlane = ACS(arCosVal) IF SGN(dy) = -1 THEN dirAngOnXYPlane = 360-dirAngOnXYPlane
IF NeedHtpstoInclPartLength THEN ROT2 dirAngOnXYPlane
HOTSPOT2 ConPosY_1, 0, unID, InclPartLength, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 ConPosY_1-1, 0, unID, InclPartLength, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 ConPosY_1+InclPartLength, 0, unID, InclPartLength, 2: unID=unID+1
DEL 1 ENDIF ENDIF
unID = 10 HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTLINE2 0, 0, outCoords[1][1], outCoords[1][2] DEL 1 IF gs_fill_pen THEN PEN gs_fill_pen if not(show_axis) then PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 3+32, 4, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS duct_show = 1, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_2D_m PEN gs_cont_pen if not(show_axis) then PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 2+32, 2+8, 0, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS duct_show = 1, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_2D_m IF (MEP_InsShow and show_isol and not(show_axis)) THEN PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 2+32, 8, 0, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS duct_show = 0, MEP_InsShow = 1, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_2D_m IF ((MEP_cline_show and show_axis_and) or show_axis) THEN ! -----> center line <----- ! PEN MEP_cline_pen SET LINE_TYPE MEP_cline_type PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 3+32, 8, 0, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS duct_show = 0, MEP_InsShow = 0, gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_2D_m, MEP_cline_show_3D = 1 PEN gs_cont_pen SET LINE_TYPE 1 ENDIF DEL TOP
IF ABS(ABS(dZz)-1) < EPS OR ABS(ABS(MEP_Position[2][3]) - 1) < EPS THEN ! --- dirAngOnXYPlane of the route --- ! arCosVal = MEP_Position[3][1]/1 IF ABS(arCosVal) > 1 AND SGN(arCosVal) = -1 THEN arCosVal = -1 IF ABS(arCosVal) > 1 AND SGN(arCosVal) = 1 THEN arCosVal = 1 dirAngOnXYPlane = ACS(arCosVal)-90 IF SGN(MEP_Position[3][2]) = -1 THEN dirAngOnXYPlane = 180-dirAngOnXYPlane ADD2 MEP_Position[1][1], MEP_Position[1][2] ROT2 dirAngOnXYPlane IF dZz < -EPS THEN MUL2 -1, 1 CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL SetProgram = SetProgram, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, DrawingNum = 1, MEP_InsShow = MEP_InsShow, MEP_cline_show = MEP_cline_show, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type=gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConShow_1 = 0, ConEdit_1 = 1, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData DEL TOP ELSE ADD2 MEP_Position[1][1], MEP_Position[1][2] HOTSPOT2 outCoords[1][1], outCoords[1][2], hceID_1 DEL 1 ENDIF
Symbol.Script_1D:
!-----------Основной--------------------- success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_axis", show_axis) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_axis_and", show_axis_and) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_isol", show_isol) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_conventions", show_conventions) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "show_size", show_size) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "gs_detlevel_2D_m",gs_detlevel_2D_m) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-mep", "gs_detlevel_3D_m", gs_detlevel_3D_m) call "Показ_систем" PARAMETERS All isMep=1, isEqp=0 RETURNED_PARAMETERS show_el, syst_name call "common_param" PARAMETERS ALL
PARAMETERS ConLength_1 = 0.13
EPS = 0.00001
! --- set connection style one for hole ----------------------------------------
DIM StyleStr[][] DIM StyleID[][]
ConToolType = ConToolType_1 queryStr = "GetConnectionTypes (" + STR(ConToolType, 1, 0) + ")" isStyleQuery = APPLICATION_QUERY ("MEPConnectionType", queryStr, StyleStr)
IF isStyleQuery THEN num = VARDIM2(StyleStr)/2
queryStr = "GetConnectionTypeStyle (" + STR(ConToolType, 1, 0) + ")" zz = APPLICATION_QUERY ("MEPConnectionType", queryStr, StyleID)
isStyleOne = 0 styleGUID = "" FOR i = 1 TO num IF StyleID[1][i] = 1 THEN styleGUID = StyleStr[1][i*2-1] isStyleOne = 1 i = num ENDIF NEXT i
IF isStyleOne THEN MEP_StrConnectionData[2][1] = styleGUID PARAMETERS MEP_StrConnectionData[2][1] = MEP_StrConnectionData[2][1] ENDIF ENDIF
! --- end of setting connection style one for hole -----------------------------
DIM TakeoffTypeStr_dim[2] TakeoffTypeStr_dim[1] = `Коническое` TakeoffTypeStr_dim[2] = `Под 45°`
DIM TakeoffTypeID_dim[2] TakeoffTypeID_dim[1] = 1 TakeoffTypeID_dim[2] = 2
num = VARDIM1(TakeoffTypeID_dim) IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "MEP_TakeoffType" THEN FOR i = 1 TO num IF MEP_TakeoffType = TakeoffTypeStr_dim[i] THEN MEP_TakeoffTypeID = TakeoffTypeID_dim[i] PARAMETERS MEP_TakeoffTypeID = MEP_TakeoffTypeID i = num ENDIF NEXT i ENDIF IF MEP_TakeoffType <> TakeoffTypeStr_dim[MEP_TakeoffTypeID] THEN MEP_TakeoffType = TakeoffTypeStr_dim[MEP_TakeoffTypeID] PARAMETERS MEP_TakeoffType = MEP_TakeoffType ENDIF
IF useSysMat AND MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] <> "0" THEN LOCK "gs_DuctMat", "gs_InsMat"
IF MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] = "0" THEN LOCK "useSysMat"
! ---------------- ! ! --- Rotation --- ! ! ---------------- !
IF ABS(DuctShapeType - 2) < EPS THEN ! LimitedRotation is used only in 2D and if the Duct Straight is not parallel to the global z-axis VALUES "LimitedRotation" 0, 90, 180, 270 ELSE addAng = 0 IF ABS(ABS(Duct_Straight_Position[2][3]) - 1) < EPS THEN dx = Duct_Straight_Position[3][1] dy = Duct_Straight_Position[3][2]
arCosVal = dx/1 IF ABS(arCosVal) > 1 AND SGN(arCosVal) = -1 THEN arCosVal = -1 IF ABS(arCosVal) > 1 AND SGN(arCosVal) = 1 THEN arCosVal = 1 addAng = ACS(arCosVal) IF SGN(dy) = -1 THEN addAng = 360-addAng n90 = INT(addAng/90) IF n90 THEN addAng = addAng - 90*n90
VALUES "Rotation" addAng, addAng+90, addAng+180, addAng+270 ELSE IF ABS(ABS(Duct_Straight_Position[2][3])) > EPS THEN VALUES "Rotation" 90, 270 ELSE VALUES "Rotation" 0, 90, 180, 270 ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
IF ABS(MEP_TakeoffTypeID - 2) < EPS THEN idDir = 0 IF ABS(MEP_Position[2][1] - MEP_NumConnectedConnectionData[2][7]) < EPS THEN idDir = 1 IF ABS(MEP_Position[2][2] - MEP_NumConnectedConnectionData[2][8]) < EPS THEN idDir = idDir + 1 IF ABS(MEP_Position[2][3] - MEP_NumConnectedConnectionData[2][9]) < EPS THEN idDir = idDir + 1 IF ABS(idDir - 3) < EPS THEN idDir = 1 ELSE idDir = 0 ENDIF
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "MEP_Flipped" THEN IF MEP_Flipped AND NOT(idDir) OR NOT(MEP_Flipped) AND idDir THEN MEP_Position[2][1] = -MEP_Position[2][1] PARAMETERS MEP_Position[2][1] = MEP_Position[2][1] MEP_Position[2][2] = -MEP_Position[2][2] PARAMETERS MEP_Position[2][2] = MEP_Position[2][2] MEP_Position[2][3] = -MEP_Position[2][3] PARAMETERS MEP_Position[2][3] = MEP_Position[2][3] ENDIF ELSE IF idDir THEN PARAMETERS MEP_Flipped = 1 ELSE PARAMETERS MEP_Flipped = 0 ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
DIM x_projection[1][3]
! ****** defaultMatrix ****** !
IF ABS(ABS(MEP_Position[2][3])-1) < EPS THEN defaultMatrix[1][1] = 0 defaultMatrix[1][2] = 0 defaultMatrix[1][3] = 1
defaultMatrix[2][1] = 1 defaultMatrix[2][2] = 0 defaultMatrix[2][3] = 0 ELSE length = SQR(MEP_Position[2][1]^2 + MEP_Position[2][2]^2)
x_projection[1][1] = MEP_Position[2][1]/length x_projection[1][2] = MEP_Position[2][2]/length x_projection[1][3] = 0
DIM MatrixT[3][3]
MatrixT[1][1] = COS(90) MatrixT[1][2] = SIN(90) MatrixT[1][3] = 0
MatrixT[2][1] = -SIN(90) MatrixT[2][2] = COS(90) MatrixT[2][3] = 0
MatrixT[3][1] = 0 MatrixT[3][2] = 0 MatrixT[3][3] = 1
PUT x_projection[1][1], x_projection[1][2], x_projection[1][3]
Coordinates = NSP/3
DIM inCoords[20][3]
FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates inCoords[cnum][1] = GET(1) inCoords[cnum][2] = GET(1) inCoords[cnum][3] = GET(1) NEXT cnum
FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates defaultMatrix[2][1] = inCoords[cnum][1]*MatrixT[1][1]+inCoords[cnum][2]*MatrixT[2][1]+inCoords[cnum][3]*MatrixT[3][1] defaultMatrix[2][2] = inCoords[cnum][1]*MatrixT[1][2]+inCoords[cnum][2]*MatrixT[2][2]+inCoords[cnum][3]*MatrixT[3][2] defaultMatrix[2][3] = inCoords[cnum][1]*MatrixT[1][3]+inCoords[cnum][2]*MatrixT[2][3]+inCoords[cnum][3]*MatrixT[3][3] NEXT cnum
defaultMatrix[1][1] = MEP_Position[2][1] defaultMatrix[1][2] = MEP_Position[2][2] defaultMatrix[1][3] = MEP_Position[2][3] ENDIF
defaultMatrix[3][1] = -defaultMatrix[2][2]*defaultMatrix[1][3]+defaultMatrix[2][3]*defaultMatrix[1][2] defaultMatrix[3][2] = -defaultMatrix[2][3]*defaultMatrix[1][1]+defaultMatrix[2][1]*defaultMatrix[1][3] defaultMatrix[3][3] = -defaultMatrix[2][1]*defaultMatrix[1][2]+defaultMatrix[2][2]*defaultMatrix[1][1]
PARAMETERS defaultMatrix[1][1] = defaultMatrix[1][1] PARAMETERS defaultMatrix[1][2] = defaultMatrix[1][2] PARAMETERS defaultMatrix[1][3] = defaultMatrix[1][3]
PARAMETERS defaultMatrix[2][1] = defaultMatrix[2][1] PARAMETERS defaultMatrix[2][2] = defaultMatrix[2][2] PARAMETERS defaultMatrix[2][3] = defaultMatrix[2][3]
PARAMETERS defaultMatrix[3][1] = defaultMatrix[3][1] PARAMETERS defaultMatrix[3][2] = defaultMatrix[3][2] PARAMETERS defaultMatrix[3][3] = defaultMatrix[3][3]
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "Rotation" | GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "LimitedRotation" THEN
! The LimitedRotation is linked to Rotation IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "LimitedRotation" THEN Rotation = LimitedRotation PARAMETERS Rotation = Rotation ENDIF
! ****** rotated MEP_Position matrix ****** !
! --- Building of Transformational Matrix
DIM MatrixT[3][3]
FOR j = 1 TO 3 FOR i = 1 TO 3 MatrixT[j][i] = defaultMatrix[j][i] NEXT i NEXT j
! --- Input Coordinates
PUT 1, 0, 0 PUT 0, COS(Rotation), SIN(Rotation) PUT 0, -SIN(Rotation), COS(Rotation)
Coordinates = NSP/3
DIM inCoords[20][3]
FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates inCoords[cnum][1] = GET(1) inCoords[cnum][2] = GET(1) inCoords[cnum][3] = GET(1) NEXT cnum
! --- the Matrix Operation, what makes the Output-Coordinates
DIM outCoords[20][3]
FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates outCoords[cnum][1] = inCoords[cnum][1]*MatrixT[1][1]+inCoords[cnum][2]*MatrixT[2][1]+inCoords[cnum][3]*MatrixT[3][1] outCoords[cnum][2] = inCoords[cnum][1]*MatrixT[1][2]+inCoords[cnum][2]*MatrixT[2][2]+inCoords[cnum][3]*MatrixT[3][2] outCoords[cnum][3] = inCoords[cnum][1]*MatrixT[1][3]+inCoords[cnum][2]*MatrixT[2][3]+inCoords[cnum][3]*MatrixT[3][3] NEXT cnum
FOR k = 1 TO 2 FOR i = 1 TO 3 MEP_Position[1+k][i] = outCoords[k][i] PARAMETERS MEP_Position[1+k][i] = outCoords[k][i] NEXT i NEXT k
length = SQR(MEP_Position[2][1]^2+MEP_Position[2][2]^2+MEP_Position[2][3]^2) IF ABS(length-1) > EPS THEN MEP_Position[2][1] = MEP_Position[2][1]/length PARAMETERS MEP_Position[2][1] = MEP_Position[2][1] MEP_Position[2][2] = MEP_Position[2][2]/length PARAMETERS MEP_Position[2][2] = MEP_Position[2][2] MEP_Position[2][3] = MEP_Position[2][3]/length PARAMETERS MEP_Position[2][3] = MEP_Position[2][3] ENDIF
length = SQR(MEP_Position[3][1]^2+MEP_Position[3][2]^2+MEP_Position[3][3]^2) IF ABS(length-1) > EPS THEN MEP_Position[3][1] = MEP_Position[3][1]/length PARAMETERS MEP_Position[3][1] = MEP_Position[3][1] MEP_Position[3][2] = MEP_Position[3][2]/length PARAMETERS MEP_Position[3][2] = MEP_Position[3][2] MEP_Position[3][3] = MEP_Position[3][3]/length PARAMETERS MEP_Position[3][3] = MEP_Position[3][3] ENDIF
FOR i = 2 TO 3 FOR j = 1 TO 3 IF ABS(MEP_Position[i][j]) < EPS THEN MEP_Position[i][j] = 0 PARAMETERS MEP_Position[i][j] = MEP_Position[i][j] ENDIF NEXT j NEXT i ELSE ! ****** Calculation of Rotation ****** !
IF ABS(ABS(MEP_Position[2][3])-1) < EPS THEN x2 = 1 y2 = 0 z2 = 0
x1 = MEP_Position[3][1] y1 = MEP_Position[3][2] z1 = MEP_Position[3][3]
arcVal = (x1*x2+y1*y2+z1*z2)/((SQR(x1^2+y1^2+z1^2))*(SQR(x2^2+y2^2+z2^2))) IF arcVal > 1 THEN arcVal = 1 IF arcVal < -1 THEN arcVal = -1 Rotation = ACS(arcVal) IF y1 < -EPS THEN Rotation = 360-Rotation PARAMETERS Rotation = Rotation ELSE DIM x_projection[1][3] DIM x_projection_90[1][3]
length = SQR(MEP_Position[2][1]^2 + MEP_Position[2][2]^2)
x_projection[1][1] = MEP_Position[2][1]/length x_projection[1][2] = MEP_Position[2][2]/length x_projection[1][3] = 0
DIM MatrixT[3][3]
MatrixT[1][1] = COS(90) MatrixT[1][2] = SIN(90) MatrixT[1][3] = 0
MatrixT[2][1] = -SIN(90) MatrixT[2][2] = COS(90) MatrixT[2][3] = 0
MatrixT[3][1] = 0 MatrixT[3][2] = 0 MatrixT[3][3] = 1
PUT x_projection[1][1], x_projection[1][2], x_projection[1][3]
Coordinates = NSP/3
DIM inCoords[20][3]
FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates inCoords[cnum][1] = GET(1) inCoords[cnum][2] = GET(1) inCoords[cnum][3] = GET(1) NEXT cnum
FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates x_projection_90[1][1] = inCoords[cnum][1]*MatrixT[1][1]+inCoords[cnum][2]*MatrixT[2][1]+inCoords[cnum][3]*MatrixT[3][1] x_projection_90[1][2] = inCoords[cnum][1]*MatrixT[1][2]+inCoords[cnum][2]*MatrixT[2][2]+inCoords[cnum][3]*MatrixT[3][2] x_projection_90[1][3] = inCoords[cnum][1]*MatrixT[1][3]+inCoords[cnum][2]*MatrixT[2][3]+inCoords[cnum][3]*MatrixT[3][3] NEXT cnum
x2 = x_projection_90[1][1] y2 = x_projection_90[1][2] z2 = x_projection_90[1][3]
x1 = MEP_Position[3][1] y1 = MEP_Position[3][2] z1 = MEP_Position[3][3]
arcVal = (x1*x2+y1*y2+z1*z2)/((SQR(x1^2+y1^2+z1^2))*(SQR(x2^2+y2^2+z2^2))) IF arcVal > 1 THEN arcVal = 1 IF arcVal < -1 THEN arcVal = -1 Rotation = ACS(arcVal) IF z1 < -EPS THEN Rotation = 360-Rotation PARAMETERS Rotation = Rotation ENDIF ENDIF
! The LimitedRotation is linked to Rotation LimitedRotation = Rotation PARAMETERS LimitedRotation = LimitedRotation
offsetTakeOff = 0 IF ABS(MEP_TakeoffTypeID - 2) < EPS THEN VALUES "InclPartLength" RANGE[0, ConLength_1) offsetTakeOff = InclPartLength/2 ENDIF
! ---------------- ! ! --- Z vector --- ! ! ---------------- !
dZx = -MEP_Position[3][2]*MEP_Position[2][3]+MEP_Position[3][3]*MEP_Position[2][2] dZy = -MEP_Position[3][3]*MEP_Position[2][1]+MEP_Position[3][1]*MEP_Position[2][3] dZz = -MEP_Position[3][1]*MEP_Position[2][2]+MEP_Position[3][2]*MEP_Position[2][1]
!!! +++ Transformational Matrix +++ !!!
DIM tMatrix[3][3]
tMatrix[1][1] = MEP_Position[2][1] tMatrix[1][2] = MEP_Position[2][2] tMatrix[1][3] = MEP_Position[2][3]
tMatrix[2][1] = MEP_Position[3][1] tMatrix[2][2] = MEP_Position[3][2] tMatrix[2][3] = MEP_Position[3][3]
tMatrix[3][1] = dZx tMatrix[3][2] = dZy tMatrix[3][3] = dZz
!!! +++ Input Coordinates +++ !!!
PUT ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1+ConLength_1, ConPosZ_1+TakeoffPos PUT gs_Connections[1][4], gs_Connections[1][5], gs_Connections[1][6] PUT gs_Connections[1][7], gs_Connections[1][8], gs_Connections[1][9]
PUT ConPosX_1+offsetTakeOff, ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1+TakeoffPos PUT -gs_Connections[1][4], -gs_Connections[1][5], -gs_Connections[1][6] PUT -gs_Connections[1][7], -gs_Connections[1][8], -gs_Connections[1][9]
Coordinates = NSP/3
DIM inCoords[20][3]
FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates inCoords[cnum][1] = GET(1) inCoords[cnum][2] = GET(1) inCoords[cnum][3] = GET(1) NEXT cnum
! --- the Matrix Operation, what make the Output-Coordinates
DIM outCoords[20][3]
FOR cnum = 1 TO Coordinates outCoords[cnum][1] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][1]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][1]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][1] outCoords[cnum][2] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][2]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][2]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][2] outCoords[cnum][3] = inCoords[cnum][1]*tMatrix[1][3]+inCoords[cnum][2]*tMatrix[2][3]+inCoords[cnum][3]*tMatrix[3][3] NEXT cnum
z = 0 FOR i = 0 TO MEP_NumberConnections-1 z = z + outCoords[1+3*i][3] NEXT i
z = MEP_Position[1][3] + z/MEP_NumberConnections
PARAMETERS ac_toplevel = z PARAMETERS ac_bottomlevel = z
ax = MEP_Position[3][1] ay = MEP_Position[3][2] az = MEP_Position[3][3]
bx = Duct_Straight_Position[3][1] by = Duct_Straight_Position[3][2] bz = Duct_Straight_Position[3][3]
ab = ax*bx+ay*by+az*bz
IF ABS(ab) > EPS OR ABS(DuctShapeType - 2) < EPS THEN reverse = 0 addWidthIn3D = DuctWidth/2+DuctWallThickness ELSE reverse = 1 addWidthIn3D = DuctDepth/2+DuctWallThickness ENDIF
!!TEXT2 0, 0, reverse
arched = 0 IF ABS(DuctShapeType - 2) < EPS THEN arched = 1 IF ABS(DuctShapeType - 3) < EPS AND ABS(DuctWidth - DuctDepth) < EPS THEN arched = 1 IF ABS(DuctShapeType - 3) < EPS AND DuctWidth < DuctDepth AND reverse THEN arched = 1 IF ABS(DuctShapeType - 3) < EPS AND DuctWidth > DuctDepth AND ABS(reverse) < EPS THEN arched = 1
IF ABS(DuctShapeType - 2) < EPS OR ABS(DuctShapeType - 3) < EPS AND DuctWidth < DuctDepth THEN duct_radius = DuctWidth/2+DuctWallThickness duct_radius_WInsThk = duct_radius+MEP_InsThickness aa = 1 ELSE duct_radius = DuctDepth/2+DuctWallThickness duct_radius_WInsThk = duct_radius+MEP_InsThickness aa = 2 ENDIF
!!text2 0, -0.5, arched !!text2 0, -1, aa
take_off_most_size = duct_radius*SIN(45) take_off_most_size_WInsThk = duct_radius_WInsThk*SIN(45) take_off_most_size_wo_wthk = (duct_radius - DuctWallThickness)*SIN(45) take_off_most_size_wo_wthk_WInsThk = (duct_radius_WInsThk - DuctWallThickness)*SIN(45)
Symbol.Script_UI:
UI_DIALOG `Специальные Параметры MEP`
DIM ui_set_str[6][2] ui_set_str[1][1] = "(A) "+`Длина Соединения` ui_set_str[2][1] = `Тип Врезки` ui_set_str[3][1] = "(B) "+`Длина Скоса` ui_set_str[4][1] = `Изоляция` ui_set_str[5][1] = `Толщина`
ui_set_str[1][2] = "ConLength_1" ui_set_str[2][2] = "MEP_TakeoffType" ui_set_str[3][2] = "InclPartLength" ui_set_str[4][2] = "MEP_InsShow" ui_set_str[5][2] = "MEP_InsThickness"
pID = 6 ui_set_str[pID][1] = `Толщина стенки` ui_set_str[pID][2] = "mep_th_elem"
DIM ui_set_attr[7][9] FOR i = 2 TO 7 FOR j = 1 TO 9 ui_set_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_set_attr[1][1] = 1 ui_set_attr[1][2] = 3 ui_set_attr[1][3] = 220 ui_set_attr[1][4] = 50 ui_set_attr[1][5] = 127 ui_set_attr[1][6] = 90 ui_set_attr[1][7] = 15 ui_set_attr[1][8] = 128 ui_set_attr[1][9] = 23
DIM ui_vis_attr[6][5] FOR i = 1 TO 6 FOR j = 1 TO 5 ui_vis_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_vis_attr[1][1] = 4 ui_vis_attr[1][2] = 1 ui_vis_attr[1][3] = 6 ui_vis_attr[1][4] = 3 ui_vis_attr[1][5] = 4
ui_vis_attr[2][1] = 1 ui_vis_attr[2][2] = 237 ui_vis_attr[2][3] = 68 ui_vis_attr[2][4] = 14
DIM ui_con_type[1] ui_con_type[1] = 0
IF useSysMat AND MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] <> "0" THEN ui_vis_attr[5][2] = 4 ui_vis_attr[6][2] = 4 ELSE ui_vis_attr[5][2] = 0 IF MEP_InsShow THEN ui_vis_attr[6][2] = 0 ELSE ui_vis_attr[6][2] = 4 ENDIF ENDIF
IF MEP_InsShow THEN ui_set_attr[6][2] = 0 ELSE ui_set_attr[6][2] = 4 ENDIF
IF MEP_StrConnectionData[1][2] = "0" THEN ui_vis_attr[4][2] = 4 ELSE ui_vis_attr[4][2] = 0 ENDIF
IF NeedHtpstoInclPartLength < 0.5 THEN ui_set_attr[4][2] = 4 ELSE ui_set_attr[4][2] = 0 ENDIF
IF ABS(MEP_TakeoffTypeID - 1) < EPS THEN IF ABS(DuctShapeType - 2) < EPS OR ABS(DuctShapeType - 3) < EPS THEN
ELSE IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21] - 2) < EPS THEN Take_off_Size = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12]+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14]*2 ELSE Take_off_Size = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][13]+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14]*2 ENDIF
IF arched THEN IF Take_off_Size < duct_radius+EPS THEN ui_set_attr[4][2] = 0 ELSE ui_set_attr[4][2] = 4 ENDIF ELSE IF ABS(DuctShapeType - 1) < EPS THEN limit_1 = (DuctWidth*reverse + DuctDepth*(reverse = 0) - Take_off_Size)/2 IF ABS(DuctShapeType - 3) < EPS THEN limit_1 = (MAX(DuctWidth, DuctDepth) - MIN(DuctWidth, DuctDepth) - Take_off_Size)/2
IF limit_1 < EPS THEN ui_set_attr[4][2] = 4 ELSE ui_set_attr[4][2] = 0 ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF ELSE ui_set_attr[4][2] = 0 ENDIF
MEP_NumberConnections = 1 CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL ui_set_str = ui_set_str, ui_set_attr = ui_set_attr, ui_vis_attr = ui_vis_attr, ui_centerline_vars = 1, ui_con_type = ui_con_type, ui_system_var_pos = 1
setPage = 1 ui_cur_page = 0 FOR j = 1 TO VARDIM1(ui_page_idx) IF ui_page_idx[j] = setPage THEN ui_cur_page = j NEXT j
IF ABS(gs_ui_current_page - ui_cur_page) < EPS THEN UI_PAGE gs_ui_current_page
UI_PICT MEP_TakeoffTypeID, 30, 45, 156, 200, 1 ENDIF
Symbol.Script_VL:
! Duct Tee ! Zsolt Feke/2007
call "FM_types_MEP" parameters
DIM shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 1 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 1 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 1 ! Oval
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" OR gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m ELSE IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D ENDIF
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Откл.` VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0
VALUES "MEP_TakeoffType" TakeoffTypeStr_dim VALUES "MEP_TakeoffTypeID" TakeoffTypeID_dim VALUES "MEP_InsThickness" RANGE(0, ] IF ABS(MEP_TakeoffTypeID - 1) < EPS OR ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[2][18]) < EPS THEN LOCK "MEP_Flipped" IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "Rotation"|\ GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "LimitedRotation"|\ ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[2][18]) < EPS|\ ABS(DuctShapeType - 1) > EPS THEN TakeoffPos = 0 PARAMETERS TakeoffPos = TakeoffPos ENDIF
gs_ui = 1
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
MEP_NumberConnections_temp = MEP_NumberConnections MEP_NumberConnections = 1
! --- 2nd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 1 ConName = `Врезка`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 1 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = -1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(setProgram) THEN IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21]-2) < EPS THEN ss = DuctDepth IF ABS(DuctShapeType-2) < EPS OR reverse THEN ss = DuctWidth
HIDEPARAMETER "ConDepth_1" IF ConWidth_1 > ss THEN ConWidth_1 = ss PARAMETERS ConWidth_1 = ConWidth_1 ENDIF VALUES "ConWidth_1" RANGE(0, ss]
ConDepth_1 = ConWidth_1 PARAMETERS ConDepth_1 = ConDepth_1 ENDIF
ss = DuctDepth IF ABS(DuctShapeType-2) < EPS OR reverse THEN ss = DuctWidth IF ConDepth_1 > ss THEN ConDepth_1 = ss PARAMETERS ConDepth_1 = ConDepth_1 ENDIF VALUES "ConDepth_1" RANGE(0, ss]
PARAMETERS ConPosX_1 = 0 ConPosZ_1 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1 = ConPosZ_1 IF reverse THEN ConPosY_1 = (DuctDepth/2+DuctWallThickness) PARAMETERS ConPosY_1 = ConPosY_1 PARAMETERS gs_AddConnections[1][2] = (DuctDepth/2+DuctWallThickness) ELSE ConPosY_1 = (DuctWidth/2+DuctWallThickness) PARAMETERS ConPosY_1 = ConPosY_1 PARAMETERS gs_AddConnections[1][2] = (DuctWidth/2+DuctWallThickness) ENDIF VALUES "ConLength_1" RANGE(0, ] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_1, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_1, ConWidth = ConWidth_1, ConDepth = ConDepth_1, ConLength = ConLength_1, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_1, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_1, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1, ConToolType = ConToolType_1, ConStatus = ConStatus_1, ConType_1 = ConType_1, ConConnectorType_1 = ConConnectorType_1, ConSystem_1 = ConSystem_1, MEP_bEnableInsulation = 1, MEP_InsShow = MEP_InsShow, gs_ui = gs_ui, ui_page_idx = ui_page_idx, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, MEP_cline_show = MEP_cline_show
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[1][1] = STR(ConToolType_1, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[1][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[1][3] = "0"
IF ABS(MEP_TakeoffTypeID - 1) < EPS THEN IF ABS(DuctShapeType - 2) < EPS OR ABS(DuctShapeType - 3) < EPS THEN LOCK "InclPartLength" InclPartLength = 0 PARAMETERS InclPartLength = InclPartLength NeedHtpstoInclPartLength = 0 ELSE IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21] - 2) < EPS THEN Take_off_Size = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12]+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14]*2 ELSE Take_off_Size = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][13]+MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14]*2 ENDIF
IF arched THEN IF Take_off_Size < duct_radius+EPS THEN limit_1 = take_off_most_size*2 - Take_off_Size/2 - SQR((duct_radius)^2-(Take_off_Size/2)^2) VALUES "InclPartLength" RANGE[0, MIN(limit_1, ConLength_1-EPS)] NeedHtpstoInclPartLength = 1 ELSE LOCK "InclPartLength" InclPartLength = 0 PARAMETERS InclPartLength = InclPartLength NeedHtpstoInclPartLength = 0 ENDIF ELSE IF ABS(DuctShapeType - 1) < EPS THEN limit_1 = (DuctWidth*reverse + DuctDepth*(reverse = 0) - Take_off_Size)/2 IF ABS(DuctShapeType - 3) < EPS THEN limit_1 = (MAX(DuctWidth, DuctDepth) - MIN(DuctWidth, DuctDepth) - Take_off_Size)/2
IF limit_1 < EPS THEN LOCK "InclPartLength" InclPartLength = 0 PARAMETERS InclPartLength = InclPartLength NeedHtpstoInclPartLength = 0 ELSE VALUES "InclPartLength" RANGE[0, MIN(limit_1, ConLength_1-EPS)] NeedHtpstoInclPartLength = 1 ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF PARAMETERS NeedHtpstoInclPartLength = NeedHtpstoInclPartLength
addWidth = InclPartLength*2 addDepth = InclPartLength*2
shapeType = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21] ELSE VALUES "InclPartLength" RANGE[0, ConLength_1) NeedHtpstoInclPartLength = 1 PARAMETERS NeedHtpstoInclPartLength = NeedHtpstoInclPartLength
addWidth = InclPartLength IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21]-2) < EPS THEN shapeType = 3 ELSE shapeType = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21] ENDIF ENDIF
IF ABS(DuctShapeType - 1) < EPS THEN IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21] - 2) < EPS THEN Take_off_Half_Size = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12]/2 ELSE Take_off_Half_Size = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][13]/2 ENDIF
IF ABS(MEP_TakeoffTypeID - 1) < EPS AND InclPartLength > EPS THEN Take_off_Half_Size = Take_off_Half_Size + InclPartLength
IF reverse THEN limit_1 = DuctWidth/2-Take_off_Half_Size ELSE limit_1 = DuctDepth/2-Take_off_Half_Size ENDIF
IF limit_1 > 0 THEN VALUES "TakeoffPos" RANGE[-limit_1, limit_1] ELSE TakeoffPos = 0 PARAMETERS TakeoffPos = TakeoffPos ENDIF ENDIF
! --- uploading of MEP_NumConnectionData
FOR k = 1 TO MEP_NumberConnections_temp FOR i = 1 TO 9 j = 1+INT((i-0.5)/3) ad = 0 IF i < 4 THEN ad = MEP_Position[1][i] MEP_NumConnectionData[k][i] = outCoords[j+3*(k-1)][i-3*(j-1)]+ad PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[k][i] = MEP_NumConnectionData[k][i] NEXT i NEXT k
IF setProgram THEN SetProgram = 0 PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram ELSE MEP_NumConnectionData[2][12] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][12] + addWidth PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[2][12] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][12] MEP_NumConnectionData[2][13] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][13] + addDepth PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[2][13] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][13] MEP_NumConnectionData[2][14] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][14] PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[2][14] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][14] MEP_NumConnectionData[2][19] = MEP_NumConnectionData[1][19] PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[2][19] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][19] MEP_NumConnectionData[2][21] = shapeType PARAMETERS MEP_NumConnectionData[2][21] = MEP_NumConnectionData[2][21]
IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][18] - 1) < EPS OR ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[2][18]) < EPS THEN LOCK "Rotation", "LimitedRotation" ENDIF
! ------------------- ! ! --- calculation --- ! ! ------------------- !
IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21] - 1) < EPS THEN gs_list_area = (ConWidth_1 + ConDepth_1)*2*ConLength_1*1.5 ENDIF
IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21] - 2) < EPS THEN gs_list_area = ConWidth_1*PI*ConLength_1*1.5 ENDIF
IF ABS(MEP_NumConnectionData[1][21] - 3) < EPS THEN gs_list_area = ((MIN(ConWidth_1, ConDepth_1))*PI+ABS(ConWidth_1-ConDepth_1)*2)*ConLength_1*1.5 ENDIF PARAMETERS gs_list_area = gs_list_area ENDIF
Symbol.Comment: Отвод воздуховода с соединением в 45° или коническим, с дополнительной изоляцией и фланцем.

String.Name: naen
String.Value: "Врезка из оц. стали толщиной 0,7 мм. прямоугольная 400x400"
